revised_title: A New Numerical Method for Solving the Space-Charge Equations
tldr: The authors present a new numerical method for solving the space-charge equations in a one-connected geometry, overcoming difficulties with previous methods. The method uses a hodograph transformation and an orthogonal mesh aligned parallel to equipotentials, resulting in automatic mesh refinement where the electric field is greatest. This approach reduces problems to a rectangular region in space and allows flexibility in choosing boundary conditions.
